fullText:
We noticed you're using an ad blocker.
			We get it: you like to have control of your own internet experience. But advertising revenue helps support our journalism. To read our full stories, please turn off your ad blocker.We'd really appreciate it.

Below are steps you can take in order to whitelist Observer.com on your browser:

Click the AdBlock button on your browser and select Don't run on pages on this domain.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Enabled on this site.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Disable on Observer.com.
dtliExcerpt: What makes The Roommate work is not just the stellar performances by Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone, but the way playwright Jen Silverman has crafted a story that feels both intimate and universal.

keyPhrases.quote: stellar performances by Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The excerpt shows clear appreciation for performances and writing craft, but lacks explicit recommendation language or superlatives that would indicate stronger enthusiasm. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights strong performances and a well-crafted story, indicating a clear recommendation to see the show. | Note: Models differed by 13 points.
